definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

pinyin: Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Nu:3 wang2
Su1 ge2 lan2 Nu:3 wang2 Ma3 li4

sentences.english: You were never just my queen,Clarisse.
sentences.chinese: 你從來就不只是我的女王。

sentences.english: Whose Princess Cinderella will you be?
sentences.chinese: 你，將成爲誰的辛德瑞拉女王？

sentences.english: I expected that the Queen does not enjoy being gawked at.
sentences.chinese: 我想女王不會喜歡被人傻乎乎地盯住不放。

sentences.english: Queen Elizabeth wrote to the Earl of Moray.
sentences.chinese: 伊麗莎白女王寫信給馬裏伯爵。

sentences.english: The speech itself was filmed at Southwark Cathedral in London.
sentences.chinese: 女王今年的聖誕演講是在倫敦的南沃克大教堂錄製的。

sentences.english: The Queen and The Duke of Edinburgh have been married for 54 years. They were married on November 20, 1947 in Westminster Abbey.
sentences.chinese: 女王與愛丁堡公爵結婚54年。

sentences.english: The Queen asked the Countess what she was embroidering.
sentences.chinese: 女王問伯爵夫人正在繡什麼。

sentences.english: Queen Victoria ascended ascended the throne in 1837.
sentences.chinese: 維多利亞女王於1837年登上王位。

sentences.english: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon described the queen as an anchor for our age.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國祕書長潘基文稱女王爲這個時代的中流砥柱。

sentences.english: Marimba smiled at the little girl.
An attractive, nutritious breakfast fit for a queen.
sentences.chinese: 好一份適合女王享用而誘人的營養早餐。

sentences.english: The Queen said that the British Royal Family is willing to make continuous efforts for the development of the UK-China relations.
sentences.chinese: 女王表示，英王室願繼續爲英中關係發展做出努力。

sentences.english: 1838 - The coronation of Victoria of the United Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 1838年的今天，英格蘭維多利亞女王舉行加冕禮。

sentences.english: It's a wonder, really, the Queen didn't choke on her Cornflakes.
sentences.chinese: 這真是奇蹟，女王在喫玉米片早餐時沒有嗆到。

sentences.english: News of the Queen's visit set the whole town astir .
sentences.chinese: 女王到訪的消息轟動全城。

sentences.english: I'm going to go guard the Queen and stand outside the palace in my tunic.
sentences.chinese: 我要去守衛女王，穿着制服站在宮殿外。

definition: lit. little princess/fig. spoiled girl/female version of 小皇帝[xiao3 huang2 di4]
